## 💬 Slack Group

Tutorial of the ICPMF Young Scientists Slack group. This is a platform to bring the Predictive Modeller Community together, in particular students and early career scientists, by making communication easier and connecting newcomers and seniors. In the “predictive-μbio” workspace, anyone can ask questions, propose activities, courses or topics for discussion, share their research and work on their research projects.
